b: when is itimer > 0 and is state = 1 then become untweened 2
when starts and is state == 1 then become untweened next
when starts and is state == 0 then is itimer = 0, become untweened 1
when starts and is itimer > 0 then become previous in 0.1s, is itimer = itimer - 0.1
when starts and is itimer <= 0 then tell success, become untweened 1
when starts then all parts face someone
when starts then turn thing invisible, play camera shutter close, is state = 0
when told by any pd-interactstart then become untweened 2, tell start
when starts then turn thing visible, play camera shutter close, is state = 1, is itimer = itimerstart
when told by any pd-interactfail then become untweened 1, tell fail, is state = 0
when told success then tell first of any pd-interactsuccess, become untweened next
when starts and is interactonce == 0 then become untweened 1
when starts and is interactonce == 1 then turn thing invisible, tell first of any pd-interactremove
